Summary: Southbound M4 and M5 buses are detoured because of construction at Broadway/W 137th St.
Description:
Southbound M4 and M5 buses are detoured because of construction at Broadway/W 137th St.
While detoured, buses will not make stops on Broadway from W 142nd St to W 138th St.

Buses will make stops as requested on Amsterdam Ave from W 145th St to W 135th St instead.

Note: Bus arrival information may not be available/accurate while buses are detoured.

Here is a map of the detour.

Summary: S40 and S90 buses will not make the Chelsea Ave/Bloomfield Ave stops in either direction due to flooding at that location.

Click this link to see how buses will run along the detoured route.

Description:
74 St-Broadway/Jackson Hts-Roosevelt Av [E][F][M][R][7] Station elevators from the street level to mezzanine and to/from the [7] platform are closed
[accessibility icon] The nearest accessible subway station connecting with the Q70-SBS is 61 St-Woodside [accessibility icon] [7]. 

For additional travel alternatives, plan your trip at mta.info, use the MTA app (download the app for iOS or Android), or check our Elevator & Escalator Status page.

What's happening?
We're replacing the elevators

Summary: M2 buses are detoured in both directions because of roadwork along Adam Clayton Powell Blvd between W 145th St and W 135th St.

.
Buses will make stops along Malcolm X Blvd from W 135th St to W 147th St instead.
Southbound buses will not make stops along Adam Clayton Powell Blvd from W 145th St to W 138th St
.
Buses will make stops along Malcolm X Blvd from W 147th St to W 135th St instead.
Note: Bus arrival information may be inaccurate or unavailable while buses are detoured.
Use this map to view how buses are detoured.

Summary: Have you noticed that we're updating bus stop signs in Queens? We're preparing for the Queens Bus Network Redesign coming this summer
Description:
Have you noticed that we're updating bus stop signs in Queens? We're preparing for the Queens Bus Network Redesign coming this summer
Queens Bus Network Redesign service improvements will be phased in by route on June 29 and August 31, 2025.

Until then, know that your bus route will still serve current stops, but some signs will reflect future service.

Use the MTA app or BusTime to plan your trip.

Learn more about the project at mta.info/queensbus
